scripts.sass: node-sass --indent-width 4 --include-path ../../.. sass/develop.scss css/develop.css && node-sass --indent-width 4 --include-path ../../.. sass/release.scss css/release.css
scripts.jsdoc: jsdoc --configure ./jsdoc.json --destination doc/v1.0.0 *.js readme.md node_modules/stb-*/*.js node_modules/spa-*/*.js node_modules/cjs-*/*.js -t ./node_modules/docdash
